languages.text: "И пока я так глазела на нее, глазела... взяла и услышала один шепоток. Намек, предположение, не более. Но я-то умею отличать досужий треп от угроз. Улучила минуту, приблизилась и шепнула Теодоре пару слов прежде, чем меня стражники уволокли. Избили, заперли в карцер — еще бы, за неподобающее якшание с чужаком и не такое светит... а потом за мной пришли люди Теодоры. Разворотили стенку, устроили бойню со стражей — лишь бы меня достать, чтобы я договорить предупреждение до конца смогла. Ну, договорить-то договорила, только назад не захотела — и пошла в услужение к фон Валанциусам".

traits.locale_text: "И пока я так глазела на нее, глазела... взяла и услышала один шепоток. Намек, предположение, не более. Но я-то умею отличать досужий треп от угроз. Избили, заперли в карцер — еще бы, за неподобающее якшание с чужаком и не такое светит... а потом за мной пришли люди Теодоры. Разворотили стенку, устроили бойню со стражей — лишь бы меня достать, чтобы я договорить предупреждение до конца смогла. Ну, договорить-то договорила, только назад не захотела — и пошла в услужение к фон Валанциусам".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "And as I gawped at her... all of a sudden I heard a whisper. A hint, a suggestion, nothing more. But I know the difference between idle chatter and a real threat. I seized my chance and approached Theodora. I managed to whisper a couple of words in her ear before the wardens dragged me away. They beat me and locked me up — no wonder, it wasn't my place to converse with outsiders... and then Theodora's people came for me. They broke down the wall, butchered the guards — all so I could tell them my warning in full. So, I said the rest, but I didn't want to go back to my old life — and so I entered the service of the von Valancius dynasty."
languages.original_text: "И пока я так глазела на нее, глазела... взяла и услышала один шепоток. Намек, предположение, не более. Но я-то умею отличать досужий треп от угроз. languages.text: “当我目不转睛地看着她时……我突然听到了一阵低语，一个暗示，一个建议，仅此而已，但我知道哪些话是闲聊，哪些话是真正的威胁。于是我抓住机会，靠近西奥多拉，想方设法在她耳边说了几句话，随后就被守卫拖走了。他们狠狠地揍了我一顿，把我关了起来。这也难怪，毕竟像我这样的人，是不允许与外来者交谈的……在那之后，西奥多拉的人就来找我了。他们轰塌了城墙，杀光了所有守卫，这样我才能把警告的全部内容完整地告诉他们。于是我说出了警告的剩余部分，但我不想再回到之前的生活，于是我便开始为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝效力。”
languages.original_text: "And as I gawped at her... all of a sudden I heard a whisper. A hint, a suggestion, nothing more. But I know the difference between idle chatter and a real threat. I seized my chance and approached Theodora. I managed to whisper a couple of words in her ear before the wardens dragged me away. They beat me and locked me up — no wonder, it wasn't my place to converse with outsiders... and then Theodora's people came for me. They broke down the wall, butchered the guards — all so I could tell them my warning in full. So, I said the rest, but I didn't want to go back to my old life — and so I entered the service of the von Valancius dynasty."

languages.text: «Y, mientras la miraba absorta... escuché un susurro de repente. Una pista, una sugerencia, nada más, pero sé diferenciar la cháchara corriente de las auténticas amenazas. Aproveché la oportunidad y me acerqué a Theodora. Conseguí susurrarle un par de palabras antes de que los guardias me sacaran de allí. Me dieron de golpes y me encerraron, lógicamente, porque no debía hablar con gente de fuera... pero, después, la gente de Theodora vino a por mí. Derribaron el muro y masacraron a los guardias... solo para que pudiera transmitirles mi advertencia al completo. De modo que les dije todo lo que tenía que decir, pero, como no quería continuar con mi antigua vida, entré al servicio de la dinastía von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "And as I gawped at her... all of a sudden I heard a whisper. A hint, a suggestion, nothing more. But I know the difference between idle chatter and a real threat. I seized my chance and approached Theodora. I managed to whisper a couple of words in her ear before the wardens dragged me away. They beat me and locked me up — no wonder, it wasn't my place to converse with outsiders... and then Theodora's people came for me. They broke down the wall, butchered the guards — all so I could tell them my warning in full. So, I said the rest, but I didn't want to go back to my old life — and so I entered the service of the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: «Y, mientras la miraba absorta... escuché un susurro de repente. Una pista, una sugerencia, nada más, pero sé diferenciar la cháchara corriente de las auténticas amenazas. De modo que les dije todo lo que tenía que decir, pero, como no quería continuar con mi antigua vida, entré al servicio de la dinastía von Valancius».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「そして、あたいが彼女に見とれている最中に…突然、ささやきが聞こえたの。ヒントとか提案とか、そんな程度のものよ。でも、あたいはたわいのないおしゃべりと本当の脅威の違いを知っているの。あたいはチャンスをつかんでシオドーラに近づいたわ。ワーデンに引きずり出される前に、なんとか彼女の耳元でいくつかの言葉をささやいたの。殴られて監禁されたわ。当たり前よね。そこは部外者と会話するための場所じゃなかったんだから…そして、シオドーラの仲間があたいを迎えに来たの。彼らは壁を壊し、衛兵を虐殺した。そうして、あたいは残りの警告を告げた。でも、元の生活に戻るのは嫌だったのよね。だからあたいはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えるようになったっていうわけ」
languages.original_text: "And as I gawped at her... all of a sudden I heard a whisper. A hint, a suggestion, nothing more. But I know the difference between idle chatter and a real threat. I seized my chance and approached Theodora. I managed to whisper a couple of words in her ear before the wardens dragged me away. They beat me and locked me up — no wonder, it wasn't my place to converse with outsiders... and then Theodora's people came for me. They broke down the wall, butchered the guards — all so I could tell them my warning in full. So, I said the rest, but I didn't want to go back to my old life — and so I entered the service of the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、あたいが彼女に見とれている最中に…突然、ささやきが聞こえたの。ヒントとか提案とか、そんな程度のものよ。でも、あたいはたわいのないおしゃべりと本当の脅威の違いを知っているの。あたいはチャンスをつかんでシオドーラに近づいたわ。ワーデンに引きずり出される前に、なんとか彼女の耳元でいくつかの言葉をささやいたの。殴られて監禁されたわ。当たり前よね。そこは部外者と会話するための場所じゃなかったんだから…そして、シオドーラの仲間があたいを迎えに来たの。彼らは壁を壊し、衛兵を虐殺した。そうして、あたいは残りの警告を告げた。でも、元の生活に戻るのは嫌だったのよね。だからあたいはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えるようになったっていうわけ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Und als ich sie anstarrte ... hörte ich plötzlich ein Flüstern. Nur ein Hauch, eine Ahnung, mehr nicht. Doch ich kenne den Unterschied zwischen leerem Geplauder und einer wahren Drohung. Ich ergriff meine Chance und näherte mich Theodora. Ich konnte ihr einige Worte ins Ohr flüstern, ehe die Wärter mich wegzerrten. Sie verprügelten mich und sperrten mich weg — kein Wunder, es stand mir nicht zu, mit Leuten von außen zu sprechen ... und dann kamen Theodoras Leute mich holen. Sie rissen die Wände ein, metzelten die Wachen nieder — alles nur, damit ich ihnen meine vollständige Warnung mitteilen konnte. Also tat ich das, doch ich wollte nicht wieder zurück in mein altes Leben. So begann ich, der Valancius-Dynastie zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "And as I gawped at her... all of a sudden I heard a whisper. A hint, a suggestion, nothing more. But I know the difference between idle chatter and a real threat. I seized my chance and approached Theodora. I managed to whisper a couple of words in her ear before the wardens dragged me away. They beat me and locked me up — no wonder, it wasn't my place to converse with outsiders... and then Theodora's people came for me. They broke down the wall, butchered the guards — all so I could tell them my warning in full. So, I said the rest, but I didn't want to go back to my old life — and so I entered the service of the von Valancius dynasty."

Also tat ich das, doch ich wollte nicht wieder zurück in mein altes Leben. So begann ich, der Valancius-Dynastie zu dienen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je la regardais, bouche bée... quand tout à coup, j'ai entendu un murmure. Une allusion, une suggestion, rien de plus. Mais je sais faire la différence entre un simple bavardage et une véritable menace. Alors j'ai saisi ma chance et j'ai abordé Théodora. J'ai réussi à lui glisser deux mots à l'oreille avant que les gardiens m'emmènent. Ils m'ont battue et jetée en cellule, ce qui n'avait rien d'étonnant, puisque j'étais pas censée parler aux étrangers... Mais ensuite, les hommes de Théodora sont venus me chercher. Ils ont abattu le mur et massacré les gardes, simplement pour que je puisse leur transmettre le reste de l'avertissement. Donc j'ai dit ce que j'avais à dire, mais comme je ne voulais pas retourner à mon ancienne vie, je suis entrée au service de la dynastie von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "And as I gawped at her... all of a sudden I heard a whisper. A hint, a suggestion, nothing more. But I know the difference between idle chatter and a real threat. I seized my chance and approached Theodora. I managed to whisper a couple of words in her ear before the wardens dragged me away. They beat me and locked me up — no wonder, it wasn't my place to converse with outsiders... and then Theodora's people came for me. They broke down the wall, butchered the guards — all so I could tell them my warning in full. So, I said the rest, but I didn't want to go back to my old life — and so I entered the service of the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: « Je la regardais, bouche bée... quand tout à coup, j'ai entendu un murmure. Une allusion, une suggestion, rien de plus. Mais je sais faire la différence entre un simple bavardage et une véritable menace. Alors j'ai saisi ma chance et j'ai abordé Théodora. Ils m'ont battue et jetée en cellule, ce qui n'avait rien d'étonnant, puisque j'étais pas censée parler aux étrangers... Mais ensuite, les hommes de Théodora sont venus me chercher. Ils ont abattu le mur et massacré les gardes, simplement pour que je puisse leur transmettre le reste de l'avertissement. Donc j'ai dit ce que j'avais à dire, mais comme je ne voulais pas retourner à mon ancienne vie, je suis entrée au service de la dynastie von Valancius. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Onu süzüyordum ki aniden bir fısıltı işittim. Bir ima, bir iddiadan ibaretti belki ama boş laflarla gerçek tehlike arasındaki farkı bilirim. Fırsatını bulduğum anda Theodora'ya iliştim. Dizdarlar beni sürükleye sürükleye uzaklaştırmadan önce kulağına birkaç sözcük fısıldamayı başardım. Beni bir temiz benzetip hücreye tıktılar, tabii ki hiç sürpriz olmamıştı. Sonuçta yabancılarla sohbet etmek benim gibi birinin haddine miydi? Sonrasında imdadıma Theodora'nın adamları yetişti. Duvarı yıkıp gardiyanları hakladılar. Hepsi de uyarımı baştan sona dinleyebilmek içindi. Anlattım ama artık eski hayatıma dönmek istemiyordum. Ben de von Valancius hanedanlığının hizmetine girdim."
languages.original_text: "And as I gawped at her... all of a sudden I heard a whisper. A hint, a suggestion, nothing more. But I know the difference between idle chatter and a real threat. I seized my chance and approached Theodora. I managed to whisper a couple of words in her ear before the wardens dragged me away. They beat me and locked me up — no wonder, it wasn't my place to converse with outsiders... and then Theodora's people came for me. They broke down the wall, butchered the guards — all so I could tell them my warning in full. So, I said the rest, but I didn't want to go back to my old life — and so I entered the service of the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Ağzı açık ayran budalası gibi onu izliyordum ki... Aniden bir fısıltı işittim. Bir ipucu, belki de öneriydi. Başka bir şey değildi. Ancak boş konuşmalarla gerçek tehdit arasındaki farkı bilirim ben. Elime fırsat geçtiği gibi Theodora'ya iliştim. Muhafızlar beni sürükleye sürükleye uzaklaştırmadan önce kulağına birkaç sözcük fısıldamayı başardım. Beni bir güzel dövüp hapsettiler ama tabii ki bu hiç sürpriz olmadı. Sonuçta yabancılarla sohbet etmek haddime değil. Ancak sonrasında Theodora'nın emrindekiler beni kurtarmaya geldiler. Duvarı yıktılar, muhafızları katlettiler... Tüm bunları yaptılar ki uyarımı baştan sona dinleyebilsinler. Ardından uyarımın devamını paylaştım ama artık eski hayatıma dönmek istemiyordum. Ben de von Valancius hanedanlığının hizmetine girdim."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
